sub_title: Systems Thinking, Modelling and Public Policy
summary:
Ryan is a graduate student from Delft University of Technology, with a strong interest in research on complex adaptive systems for policy/planning. He has worked as a research assistant in various research centres conducting case studies in the Asian context with regard to water resource management, disaster resilience, livelihood systems, urban connectivity and accessibility. He is often more curious about the "why" of things.

In his free time, he conducts numerous self-initiated projects and plays with experimental data and models.
